greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: (Number of 1's in the binary expansion of n) mod 4.
comment: This is the generalized Thue-Morse sequence t_4 (Allouche and Shallit, p. 335).
reference: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, Automatic Sequences, Cambridge Univ. Press, 2003.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 11 2011
